name: Boldface
short_description: boldface is social community built to enhance communication among internet users,since communication is most carried out on computers,pc depriving a lot of internet usres to use their to communicate free and conveniently, that is why we took our time to develop this mobile messenger to enable them communicate on the go. there is no head ach on thinking of how to power your pc when power is out, enjoy your mobile messenger on your mobile communicate with your friends without any kind of inconvenience.
summary: boldface mobile messenger is built to enhance communication among user
